thread.title: BRIEF-AMN Healthcare Announces New Revolving Credit Facility

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-AMN Healthcare Announces New Revolving Credit Facility

organizations.name: brief-amn healthcare announces new revolving credit facility

text:
February 12, 2018 / 12:51 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-AMN Healthcare Announces New Revolving Credit Facility Reuters Staff 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - AMN Healthcare Services Inc: * AMN HEALTHCARE ANNOUNCES NEW REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY 
* AMN HEALTHCARE SERVICES INC - ENTERED INTO A NEW $400 MILLION REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY 
* AMN HEALTHCARE SERVICES INC - NEW FIVE-YEAR AGREEMENT REPLACES PREVIOUS $275 MILLION CREDIT FACILITY 
* AMN HEALTHCARE SERVICES - AGREEMENT INCLUDES ABILITY TO EXPAND BORROWING BY $250 MILLION PLUS ADDITIONAL AMOUNTS BASED ON NET LEVERAGE RATIO TEST Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
